name: Bubble Jumper
description:
GAME SUMMARY

Enjoy the exciting adventures of creatures by jumping through bubbles and reaching the top of the glass. Challenge yourself to go through different glasses of vibrant drinks. Easy aim and release controls, rich visual effects, and addictive gameplay.

Character Skins  Bubble Coin Credits: 
  • Cesar Vinken (Developer) 
  • Mustafa Naweed(2D Artist) 
  • Gökçe Yalçınkaya (2D Artist) 
  •  Bora Erk (Level Designer)
